com.brinfotech.feedbacksystem.customClas.android:text: When you find yourself engaging in thoughts or emotions that take you away from centeredness and peace, make a mental note or even a note on your cell phone or a piece of paper about the situation to help you remember later for journaling. Next, take a few moments, as you are able, to allow the thoughts or feelings just to be with you. Observe the feeling objectively (without trying to change it and without judging it) and allow it like a wave to peak and subside, you can even feel it dissolve. Note the effect upon your consciousness. This is also a form of mindfulness practice and will further and deepen your journey into truth.
